articles.title: Chiefs-Colts Week 12 predictions from Arrowhead Pride - Arrowhead Pride
articles.description: Let’s see what AP staffers (and readers) think about Sunday’s game between the Kansas City Chiefs and Indianapolis Colts.
articles.content: Before the Kansas City Chiefs met the Denver Broncos in the NFLs Week 11, every member of our Arrowhead Pride panel picked the Chiefs to win. For the second straight week and the fourth time this sea… [+10271 chars]
